feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 10:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to periods of freezing rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
